title: What type of charge creates equipotentials

content.description:
The following questions are related to this scenario:

The diagram above shows a cross section of equipotential lines produced by a charge distribution. Points A, B, C, and D lie in the plane of the page.
content.question: The electric potential shown in the diagram could be created by which of the following?

choices.label: A large sheet of positive charge
Two long lines of charge: one positive and one negative
A long line of positive charge and a negative point charge

content.answer: Two long lines of charge: one positive and one negative

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
